citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live dogs and cats.
citations.narrative:
On 3/13/2024 , an adult German Shepherd was accepted for transport . The dog was allowed to ride loose in the transport
vehicle since the transporter did not have a crate large enough for the dog . The dog could easily be injured or escape
during transport if not contained in a cage or crate . The dog or cat must be contained in a primary enclosure such as a
compartment, transport cage, carton, or crate to prevent injury to the animal or persons.
CORRECT BY : 3/25/2024
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the Registrant .
n

narrative:
3.15(a) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live dogs and cats. 
On 3/13/2024 , an adult German Shepherd was accepted for transport . The dog was allowed to ride loose in the transport 
vehicle since the transporter did not have a crate large enough for the dog . The dog could easily be injured or escape 
during transport if not contained in a cage or crate . The dog or cat must be contained in a primary enclosure such as a 
compartment, transport cage, carton, or crate to prevent injury to the animal or persons.  
CORRECT BY : 3/25/2024 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the Registrant . 
 
 n
